column1: The Pit Room////The portions are large
column2: but I did find the price a little steep compared to other BBQ places. Then again
column3: it tastes better so no real complaints from me. The charro beans and mac-n-cheese sides were both very good with authentic
column4: rich flavor (especially the beans! Try them!). My husband ordered the brisket dinner with 2 sides for the same price. He also loved the charro beans
column5: but his second side was the potato salad. Be prepared for authentic
column6: house-made potato salad - the kind with tons of fixings in it
column9: THE works! It was the epitome of southern BBQ in my book.
